El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo. Iván es la primera persona parada del lado derecho.
texts.en:
The “LA UNION HACE LA FUERZA” communal bank is composed of honest and hard-working men and women who are very pleased to be in their 7th loan cycle. 

Ivan is 44 years old. He is in a common-law relationship and has two children studying in Secondary School. For 20 years he has been offering taxi services. Years ago he worked for a public entity doing maintenance on vehicles. The loan will be invested in the maintenance of his vehicle. 

The group is grateful to the lenders from Kiva for the loan. Ivan is the person standing on the right side of the group.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Sam Ann

texts.en:
Sam Ann is 36 years old and has a spouse. She works in agricultural business, growing rice on a few pieces of farmland in Kralanh district, Siem Reap province. From this business, she is able to earn a decent income to help with household expenses. They’ve had two children, both of whom are attending school.

Currently, Sam Ann’s family doesn’t have a safe latrine for use at home, so she wants to improve their sanitation and personal hygiene. In this particular way, she has requested a loan of 1,300 US dollars to build a household latrine. The water loan program offered by HKL and Kiva with a special interest rate has encouraged her to focus on healthy living conditions, safeguard the health of her family and protect the environment.

loans.use: to build a latrine to improve the sanitation for the household.

loans.name: Mbayang's Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe fait partie du banc villageois Doxx Dajé créé le 29 mars 2013; il est composé de trente deux femmes qui habitent le même village. Elles ont comme activités principales le maraîchage, l'élevage et le petit commerce.

Madame Dieynaba présidente du banc villageois est âgée de 47 ans . Elle est mariée mère de six enfants ( quatre filles et deux garçons).Elle est debout sur la photo à droite et a levé la main.


Elle envisage avec son prêt acheter 100 poussins à 52500 F pour faire de l'aviculture ; elle va aussi acheter des aliments et des vaccins.Ainsi à la vente elle espère se faire beaucoup de revenus.


Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut renforcer son épargne afin de bénéficier d'un prêt plus consistant pour élargir son champ d'action.
texts.en:
This group is part of the 'banc villageois' called Doxx Dajé, which was created on March 29, 2013; it comprises 32 women who live in the same village. Their main work involves market gardening, livestock farming, and small-scale commerce.  

Ms. Dieynaba, the president of the 'banc villageois' is 47 years old. She is a married mother of six (four girls and two boys). She is standing at the right in the photo with her hand raised. 

With her loan, she envisions purchasing 100 chicks at 52,500 francs for her poultry farming; she is also going to purchase some feed and vaccines. Thus, from her sales, she hopes to bring in a lot of revenues. 

With the profits she wants to bolster her savings in order to benefit from a bigger loan, so as to expand her scope of business.

loans.use: to purchase chicks for her poultry farming

loans.name: Hellen

texts.en: Hellen is a sixth-grade dropout and lives in Congo Town, one of the most popular business areas in Montserrado County. She is married to a driver and has two children, ages 4 and 13. Both of her children are presently in school and live at home. Hellen established a frozen food business ten years ago, selling items such as fish, chicken, pig's feet, spareribs, etc. She learned this way of selling from her friends. She spends ten hours per day on her business. She is proud of her business because she makes lots of money. She is requesting a loan to purchase more frozen foods such as fish, chicken, pig's feet, spareribs, etc. for her business. Her plans are to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase frozen food items.

loans.name: Fotima

texts.en:
Fotima is a widowed woman. Her husband died some years ago. Nowadays, she is the only provider for her 3 children. 

Fotima lives in a house that is in bad condition. Her children want to live in the house in good condition, but Fotima's income from her job is not enough for it. She works in a café as a baker. 

Fotima is asking for a loan of 600 USD to buy building materials to repair her house. In this way she will be able to offer her family a better quality of life and moral stability that will allow them to progress. She awaits your support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy building materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Oscar Alfonso

texts.es:
Oscar es un joven de 19 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con sus padres y hermanos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Oscar no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Oscar trabaja como agente de vigilancia en una empresa de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Oscar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará una moto lineal de segundo uso, la cual utilizará para transportarse a su centro de trabajo y ahorrara en pasajes, así pues Oscar seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de estudiar una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Oscar is a single young man of 19 years old. He lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial with his parents and siblings. He is very enthusiastic and hard-working and has great desire to get ahead. Unfortunately due to a lack of financial resources he could not study for a professional career. 

On his own initiative Oscar works as a security agent at a business in the city. He works every day for about 10 hours and feels that things are going well due to his dedication and effort.

Oscar is very grateful to the lenders at Kiva as thanks to the financial support they offer, he can buy a motorcycle, second-hand. He will use it to transport himself to his work and save on paying for public transportation. And he will strive to achieve his big dream which is to study to be a professional.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Sakardaymar

texts.en:
Sakardaymar is 46 year old and lives in Congo Town. She is a widow and has six children between the ages of 9 and 28. Only two of her children attend school and live at home. 

Sakardaymar has been selling coal and shortbread for the past fifteen years. She says sometimes she experience losses but not all of the time. She is requesting a loan to purchase more coal, flour, oil, butter, sugar, baking-powder, etc. for her business. She hopes to extend her business in other fast food centers and send her children to college in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more coal, flour, oil, butter, sugar, baking-powder, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Felicia

texts.en:
Felicia is 42 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is married and her husband is a businessman. They have 3 children between the ages of 18 and 25, one of whom attends school.

Felicia has been operating a provision shop for the past five years. She sells soap, toothpaste, rice, oil and other things. She says sometimes she experiences losses but not all of the time.

Felicia is requesting a loan to purchase more soap, toothpaste, rice, oil and other things for her business. She hopes to extend her business in other counties and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more soap, toothpaste, rice, oil and other things for her business.

loans.name: Promise

texts.en:
Promise is 37 years old and lives in Congo Town. She is single and has two children who are 4 and 16. They attend school and live at home.

For the past years, Promise has been involved in small trading, which she enjoys a whole lot because she makes a lot of profit.  Promise is requesting a loan to purchase more coal by bag for her business. She hopes to build a house for her children and send them to quality schools.

loans.use: to purchase more coal by bag for her business.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 39 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is married and has 3 children between the ages of 5 and 11. They all attend school. 

Grace has been operating a small shop where she fixes and sells iron soap (local soap made from caustic and oil) for the past four years.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more caustic and red oil for her business. She plans to increase her business volume.

loans.use: to purchase more caustic and red oil for her business.

loans.name: Nissan Group

texts.en:
Secilia, who is in her early 30s, is single with a boy who is in school. For three years now, she has been managing her family food expenses by running two activities: a motorbike for transportation and tailoring. Secilia, who is a tailor, is also training students how to design and make clothes.  She works from 8:00 am to 7:00 pm each working day and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Secilia's third loan from Kiva partner Tujijenge Tanzania. She used her previous loans to expand her portfolio by starting a motorcycle business for transportation and purchasing missing tailoring materials and one business machine. She has managed to pay back all her previous loans successfully. Secilia used her business profit to cover school fees, household expenses and reinvested back to her business. She will use this loan to increase on business materials. She dreams of opening a shop selling tailoring materials. 

Secilia will share this loan with her loan group “Nissan” which consists of 6 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase on business materials

loans.name: Gladis Del Carmen

texts.es: Gladis del Carmen mayor de edad soltera con dos hijos mayores de edad originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega zona ubicada en el occidente del país, es una micro empresaria la cual se dedica a la compra venta de mercadería en general como: variedades estilos de ropa nueva, cosméticos, zapatos entre otros, sus compras las realiza al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales todos por encargo y de forma ambulante, ella inicia su jornada diaria desde muy temprano llevando a cuesta un bolso grande donde comienza a distribuir su mercadería, uno de sus sueños es poder mejorar su casa de habitación, y que su negocio sea mas grande, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en mercadería y poder surtir mas su inventario por lo que para estas fechas sus demanda son mayores y sus ganancias son mejores. Gladis Agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Gladis del Carmen is a mature single mother with two adult children. She comes from one of the towns in Chinandega, an area situated in the west of the country. She is a small businesswoman, buying and selling general merchandise such as various styles of new clothing, cosmetics, shoes and other items. She sells in cash and on credit to regular and occasional customers, all through orders and as a street vendor. She begins her day very early carrying a large bag on her back from which she starts to sell her merchandise.

One of her dreams is to improve her home and for her business to be bigger. The purpose of the loan is to invest in merchandise so she can have a better supply of stock since at this time of year she has more demand and makes better profits. 

Gladis is very grateful to the Kiva lenders for the support they give to people of limited means.

loans.use: to buy new clothing for children and adults, shoes, cosmetics and other items.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.es: Fidel tienen 32 años, está casada con Elva y tiene 2 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia hecha de madera. Se caracteriza por ser una persona muy trabajadora y con abundante cariño hacia su familia. Se inició hace 13 años en las actividades agrícolas como es la producción de cacao, café, achiote en los terrenos que le cedieron sus padres al empezar su propia vida conyugal. Comenta que cuando se inició no tenía tanta motivación por el progreso siendo ya distinto con la llegada de sus hijos por quienes es capaz de dar la vida según menciona muy alegre. Su labor consiste en realizar un permanente mantenimiento a sus plantaciones con el objetivo de lograr obtener en la cosecha frutos de calidad que posteriormente venderá a los acopiadores del lugar. Para desarrollar su labor con  fluidez debe contar con dinero que le permite comprar los insumos necesarios como el abono orgánico, herramientas y otros. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está primera oportunidad desea contar con 500 nuevo soles para adquirir 10 sacos de abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Fidel is 32 years old. He is married to Elva and has two children with whom he lives in their own house made of wood. He is a very hard-working and has an abundance of love for his family. Thirteen years ago he started growing things like cocoa, coffee and achiote (a spice) on the land that his parents gave him to start his married life. 

Fidel comments that he didn't have a lot of motivation at the beginning, but with the arrival of his children that changed. For them he would give his life, they give him so much joy. His work consists of constantly maintaining his fields with the goal of producing quality harvests which he sells to middlemen in the area. 

To carry out this work properly he has to have enough money to buy the necessary agricultural supplies, like organic fertilizer, tools, etc. This is his first loan with Kiva and he feels very grateful for the financial support he is receiving so he can get ahead. He promises to pay his installments on time. With this first loan he would like to receive 500 PEN to purchase 10 bags of organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Sreyma

texts.en:
Sreyma is 25 years old and married with a small child. She currently lives with her family in her own house located in Ruessei Kaev district, a suburb area of Phnom Penh. To make a living, she retails grocery items and ingredients in a local market and earns approximately USD 7.00 per day. Aside from her income, the family also relies on the other source of income generated by her husband, who has a position in a market as a goldsmith.

As her husband is experiencing financial difficulties in his current business, Sreyma would like to acquire a loan in the amount of 1,500 US dollars to help her husband continue his business. She will buy raw materials for the process of making jewelry, such as silver, gold and other inputs. This loan will allow her husband to sustain his current business and make a stable income for the family. Sreyma and her family are relying heavily on the goodwill of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their support.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for the process of making jewelry, such as silver and gold.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 38 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is unmarried and her fiancé is a businessman. They have two children who are 4 and 7 and are attending school. 

For the past ten years, Ruth has been selling soft drinks and cold water in the local market. She enjoys her business. One thing she loves the most is that she gets more income to enable her to pay her children's tuition. 

Ruth is requesting a loan to purchase more soft drinks and cold water. She plans to build a house and buy a car in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks and cold water.

loans.name: Classic Group

texts.en:
Mathayo, who is a single man in his late twenties, has been managing his life expenses by running a barber shop business. He has been in this enterprise for four years, working from 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. daily. He is able to make a small profit.
 
This is his first loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. He plans to use this loan to improve his barber shop place by putting in tiles and coloring it with a nice attractive color. Mathayo dreams of improving his business and upgrading his education level. 

He will share this loan with his loan group, Classic. The group contains eight members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to improve his barber shop by putting in tiles and to color it with a nice attractive color.

loans.name: Mbalamwezi Group

texts.en:
Verediana, who is in her mid-30s, is married with two sons, who are in school. 

Since 2002, she has had a cafe business selling soft drinks, bites, and breakfast.   She is doing well. She starts her cafe business from 6 a.m. and stays open to midnight with an ability of receiving a good range of monthly profit. 

This will be her first loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use it to buy a juicer for making fresh juice, to buy a business fridge and chairs, and to color her cafe with a new attractive color.  Verediana, who is showing a good experience, dreams of being a big businessperson, managing a big food business. 

She will share this loan with her loan group “MBALAMWEZI,” which totals five members. The members of the group hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a juicer for making fresh juice, tto buy a business fridge and chairs, and to color her cafe a new attractive color.

loans.name: Emprendedoras De Casa Huerta Group

texts.es: “EMPRENDEDORAS DE CASA HUERTA”  se encuentra conformada por 05 socios quienes se dedican a diversas actividades del comercio minorista. Amanda tiene 47 años es casada con tres hijos educando hace 02 años se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas en forma ambulatoria. Años atrás trabajaba como costurera. De esta manera puede apoyar a su esposo con la educación y alimentación de sus 03 hijos. En el grupo cumple la función de presidenta.  El préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de de polos, short, pantalones. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el préstamo brindado. Amanda es la primera persona sentada del lado derecho.
texts.en:
The “EMPRENDEDORAS DE CASA HUERTA”  group is made up of 5 members who work in various retail activities. Amanda is 47 years old and is married with 3 children who are studying. Years ago she used to work as a seamstress. For 2 years she has been selling women's clothing as a street vendor and by doing this she is able to help her husband to provide education and food for her 3 children. 

Amanda will use the loan to buy polo shirts, shorts and trousers. 

The group is grateful to the Kiva lenders for the loan provided. In the group Amanda has the role of president and is seated on the right hand side in the photo.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, shorts and jeans.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn a 23 year old woman who lives in the Paynesville area. She stopped her education at 6th grade and has three children who live at home and attend school. 

For 7 years, Evelyn has been running a table where she sells both bath and washing soap. She has a lot of customers and her goods finish selling every two days. 

Evelyn is requesting a loan to purchase more bath and washing soap to resell in the local market. She plans to become a big businesswoman. She thanks the supporters of BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more bath and washing soap to resell in the local market.

loans.name: Sacon

texts.en:
Sacon is 23 years old and lives in Paynesville. Her fiancé is a local businessman. They have two children who are 5 and 7, live at home and attend school.

For the past 4 years, Sacon has been selling fresh fish in the local market. She learned this business by looking at her mother. One of the challenges she faces is that during the raining season she makes a low profit.  

Sacon is requesting a loan to purchase fresh fish for her business. She plans to build a house in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fresh fish for her business.

loans.name: Aisha

texts.en:
Aisha is a first-year student at AUCA, and here is her story. 

“Entering University is one of the important moments in every person’s life. It demands some maturity, responsibility for your actions and plans for future. 

"AUCA gives a good opportunity to get financial aid. I am applying for it as my family can’t afford to cover it. My parents are not so young and they soon are going to be retired. So it is difficult for us to pay the full tuition fee. 

"I have dreamed about studying at the American University of Central Asia. As it is the best University within the context of Central Asia. My willingness about becoming a good specialist makes me feel that AUCA is the place where I could make my wishes happen.”

loans.use: To pay for her higher education.

loans.name: Moeun

texts.en:
Moeun is a farmer from Cheung Prey, Kampong Cham province. She is married and the mother of three children. Her oldest child is employed,and the other two are still at school and depend on her income. 

Since she was a young girl, Moeun used to help her parents with the farming chores, and this earned her good farming practices. Moeun aims to gradually improve her farming productivity and increase the household income. 

For this reason, she would like to borrow the sum of KHR 2,000,000 to buy a plot of land to enlarge her farming areas. She hopes that, through this investment, she will be able to have better crop yields and generate more income to satisfy their basic living needs. 

Moeun and her family rely heavily on the good will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to enlarge her farming areas.

loans.name: Sergio Hans

texts.es:
Sergio es un hombre de 22 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Sergio no ha podido estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Sergio trabaja como vendedor en una empresa de mayolicas de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Sergio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprará una cocina y utensilios de cocina para su vivienda, así pues el seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de poder estudiar una profesión.
texts.en:
Sergio is a 22-years old man.  He is single and lives in Pucallpa with this parents and siblings.  Sergio is very hard-working and enthusiastic.  He has a great desire to get ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to start working, Sergio has not been able to study at the university level. 
On his own initiative, Sergio started working as a salesman at a ceramic tile business in his city.  He works every day for approximately ten hours.  He believes it is going well for him because of his dedication and hard work. 
Sergio feels very grateful for the Kiva lenders; thanks to the help they are offering, he will purchase a stove and utensils for his home.  He will keep working and putting forth the effort needed to make his greatest dream come true- to study at the university level.

loans.use: to purchase a stove and utensils.

loans.name: Juntos Unidos Iremos Al Camino Del Éxito "juice" Group

texts.es: Elva  de 34 Años de edad soltera y con 2 hijos, elva  se dedica hace  3 años al servicio de costura remalle elva  confecciona prendas de vestir, en un pequeño local (alquilado) con el fin de progresar día a día y salir adelante, elva  ha sabido ganarse a los clientes  y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida. Elva  solicito el préstamo para comprar telas y poder seguir  confeccionando  ropa de vestir  la vez  elva  y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos  con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado  y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. Elva  está parada y se le distingue con un polo verde  es la segunda de  la mano derecha,  Se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en:
Elva, age 34, is single and has two children.  For three years Elva has been providing sewing and mending services.  She makes garments at a small place (rented) in order to progress day to day and to get ahead.  Elva has known how to win over customers.  This way she is able to improve her quality of life.

Elva requested the loan to buy fabric and to be able to continue making clothing.  Elva and all of the members are grateful to Kiva for the loan that was granted and for the trust that has been placed in them.

Elva is standing, and she is wearing a green polo type shirt.  She is the second from the right.  She bids farewell, promising that she will meet all of her proposed goals.

loans.use: to buy fabric for making clothes.

loans.name: Murotjon

texts.en: Murotjon is married and has 3 children who are not yet adults. His wife is a housewife. He is only breadwinner in his family. He worked in many places but all of his previous jobs were without success. He is a good driver, so he has decided to organize a new business. Murotjon will manage the business alone, and he hopes to be a very successful businessman as he is hardworking and smart. He is asking for a loan of 3000 USD to buy a car for his new business. He will get through, using this loan, and his business will become a source of income so that his family can have a good quality of life and better financial opportunities to progress. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy a car for establishing his new business

loans.name: Juliana's Group

texts.en:
Juliana, who is in her early 40s, is single and has two children who go to school. 

She has run a business selling plastic products since 2008. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Juliana's fifth loan from ID Ghana. She used the previous loan to increase her stock of plastic products and has successfully repaid the loan. She used the profit for household expenses. 

She will use this loan to buy more stock of plastic items, such as plates and buckets, and then resell them. She dreams of owning two similar annex shops to increase sales and make more profit. 

Juliana will take this loan with three others who will hold each other accountable for repaying the loan amount of 2,250 GHS.

loans.use: To buy more stock of plastic items, such as plates and buckets, and then resell them.

loans.name: Aiperi

texts.en:
iperi is a first-year student of the American University of Central Asia, Department of Economics. Here is her story.

“[A] few years ago a friend of my sister told us about her orientation week at AUCA, classmates, professors, classes and everything that she experienced at AUCA. Her story admired me so much, and I was always thinking about this place. After a small research and talking to students about different universities of Bishkek, I [came to the] conclusion to enroll AUCA. Among offered departments I chose the Economics Department. Of course other universities in Kyrgyzstan also have departments of economics and offer different specializations. However, the Economics Department of AUCA is a unique place where I will gain knowledge in English and will be granted Bard degree that provides a great opportunity to be employed with transnational companies abroad. Besides, I study in diverse community with students from all over the world, gain knowledge from high-qualified local and foreign professors, and will become demanded professional in high competitive job market. I believe that as a result, I will gain knowledge and skills that will lead and open doors to my bright future and achieve my goals to help not only my family, but also a community where I have obtained basic knowledge at school. I would like to mention that this is not the only opportunity that AUCA gives to all its students. One of them is Kiva loan. So, I would like to apply for it, so that I will be able to cover my tuition fees.”

loans.use: To pay for higher education.

loans.name: Banke

texts.en:
Banke is 28 years old and lives in Paynesville. She’s single with three children between 8 and 12 years old. The children all live at home and attend school. 

For the last 10 years she has been selling fresh fish. She learned this business from her friends. She sells for four hours per day from Monday to Saturday. Her main challenge is the rainy season, as she has less fresh fish to sell. She requested this loan to enable her purchase more fresh fish. 

In the future, she would like to buy a piece of land to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more fresh fish.

loans.name: Tebbeh

texts.en:
Tebbeh is 25 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is married and has six- and five-year-old children, who live at home and attend school. Tebbeh is a 9th-grade dropout. For the past six years, she has been selling soap, body cream, and the like, in the local market. She has requested this loan to purchase more of the goods mentioned above. She says her problem is low goods on her sales table at the market.

She started this business by helping her mother on the table. The business makes her proud, because it helps her to pay her children's school fees. In future, she would like to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more goods for inventory, like soap and body cream

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика 40 лет назад родилась в семье фермера. Она данное время живет вместе с семьей на северной части Таджикистана. Она раньше занималась купле продажей парфюмерии. Малика 3 месяца назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей индустриальных товаров. Она стремиться к тому, чтобы развевать свой бизнес. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Малика получила много новой информации для себя. Малика хочет расширить оборотный капитал и таким образом привлечь больше клиентов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 15000 сомони для покупки индустриальных товаров для расширения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Malika was born 40 years ago in a family of a farmer.  At the present time, she lives with her family in the northern part of Tajikistan.  She was previously involved in buying and selling perfumes.  Malika started her own business in buying and selling industrial goods three months ago.  She strives to develop her business.  With this goal in mind, she completed the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women.  Malika received a lot of new information for herself.  Malika wants to increase her working capital and, thus, attract more clients.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 15000 somoni to purchase industrial goods to increase her working capital.  She awaits your kindness and hopes for your mercy.

loans.use: to purchase industrial goods to increase her working capital

loans.name: Abdumalik

texts.ru: Абдумалик трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он не женат и является студентом 1 курса. Он учится в Худжандский Государственный Университет. Абдумалик учится отлично и хорошо. Он начитанный молодой человек и всегда в поиске новшества. В свободное от занятий время он занимается купле продажей мобильных телефонов. Таким образом, он помогает родителям по обеспечению семьи. Абдумалик должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. В будущем он мечтает стать хорошим специалистом.
texts.en: Abdumalik is a hardworking and conscientious person.  He is not married and a first-year student.  He attends the Khujand State University.  Abdumalik studies well and with excellence.  He is a well-read person and is always seeking novelty.  In his time free from studies, he is involved in buying and selling mobile phones.  This is how he helps his parents to provide for the family.  Abdumalik has to pay for his university tuition but does not have money.  He is requesting this loan to pay for this tuition.  He awaits your kindness and hopes for your mercy.  He dreams of becoming a good specialist in the future.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Sevak

texts.en:
Sevak is from the town of Vanadzor. He has been driving a taxi for the past two years. He lives with his wife, parents, and two-year-old daughter (in the photo). Sevak is a very hardworking young man who does his best to sustain his family's living. As the income Sevak gets is only enough for covering the family's costs, Sevak isn't able to save money to renovate his car. Therefore, he is asking for this loan. 

Sevak has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is highly important for Sevak, and he will be very grateful to all lenders for their support. The loan will give him an opportunity to continue his taxi-driving business and provide better service to his clients.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of his car

loans.name: Umazi

texts.en:
Umazi is 23 years old. She is married to Mgandi and they have four children. They own a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past year, Umazi has operated a business selling goat meat to her local customers. She cites seasonality as her major challenge.

With the requested loan of KES 20,000 she wants to purchase six goats for meat to sell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase six goats for meat.

loans.name: Idrissa

texts.en:
This is 35 year-old Idrissa. He is married and has 4 children aged 14, 11, 8, and 6 years. He has 2 additional dependents, who live with him for schooling.  

In 2000, Idrissa established his jewelry business. He began his business just to engage himself in an economy activity. His business is located at the city center, and his main customers are all classes of businesspeople. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, he earns about SLL 1,500,000 every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000 in order to buy necklaces (500,000), bracelets (450,000), and earrings (500,000). He hopes that this loan will increase his stock levels and hence his profits. 

In the future, Idrissa plans to build a house and to establish a branch shop. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy jewelry for resale

loans.name: Raphael Hugo

texts.es:
Raphael es un hombre de 20 años, es soltero, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus padres y hermanos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; actualmente Rafhael trabaja como asistente administrativo en una empresa municipal de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y buen desempeño.
Raphael se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada comprara una cocina y utensilios para esta, de esta manera el y su familia podrán preparar mejor sus alimentos, así pues Raphael seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser un buen profesional.
texts.en:
Raphael is a 20 year old single man.  He lives in the city of Pucallpa with his parents and siblings.  He is very hard-working and enthusiastic.  He has a great desire for self-improvement.  

Raphael currently works as an administrative assistant for a municipal company in his city.  He works every day for approximately ten hours.  He believes that it is going well for him because of his dedication and good performance.

Raphael is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help provided, he will buy a stove and utensils.  This way he and his family will be able to better prepare their food.  This way Raphael will continue working and putting forth great effort in order to achieve his big dream of becoming a good professional.

loans.use: to buy a stove.

loans.name: Fanta

texts.en:
Fanta is 23 years old and lives in Paynesville. She and her fiancé stay together along with two children, ages one and five. One attends school. 

For the past seven years she has been selling African and European movie discs in the local market. Her main challenge is low income. She learned this business from her parent. She has requested this loan to buy more discs for her business. 

In the future, she would like to have her own house and educate all her children.

loans.use: to buy more discs for her business

loans.name: Monee

texts.en: Monee lives in Paynesville. She is 30 years old and has three children between the ages of 1 and 14. They live at home and two of them attend school. Monee has completed 4th grade. She is requesting a loan in order to buy more fish for her business. She likes how this business generates more money. In the future, Monee plans to educate her children and build a house.

loans.use: to buy more fish for her business.

loans.name: Ana Aracely

texts.es: Ana de 24 años de edad reside en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida y su pequeño hijo. Ana es una mujer trabajadora, dedicada y responsable. Junto a su compañero de vida mantienen la economía de su hogar y juntos han logrado construir una pequeña casa la cual aún le hacen falta algunas mejoras. Ana se dedica a la venta de gallinas y pollos dentro de su comunidad. Gracias a la experiencia en el negocio se ha logrado ganar la confianza de muchas personas quienes cada día prefieren más sus productos. Solicita este crédito para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava ya que desea encementar el piso de su casa el cual es de tierra y al mismo tiempo repellar las paredes ya que son  a base de lodo y se están deteriorando con las lluvias y el sol.
texts.en: Ana, who is 24-years old, lives in a house on her property with her husband and their young son.  Ana is a hard-working, dedicated and responsible woman.  Together with her husband, she sees to her household's finances and they have been able to build a small house, which still needs some improvements.  Ana makes her living selling hens and chickens in her community.  Thanks to her experience with the business, she has earned the trust of a lot of people who, day by day, request her products more and more.  Ana is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of cement, sand and gravel.  She needs to cement the earthen floor of her house and also plaster the walls, which are made of mud and are deteriorating with the rain and sun.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and gravel to cement the floor and plaster the walls.

loans.name: Gnel

texts.en:
Gnel is from Gyumri town, where he lives with his parents and brother. Gnel has been providing refrigerator-repair services to locals, for already five years. He takes orders from local stores and individuals, and works hard to meet their needs.

The income that Gnel gets is very important for meeting the family's daily needs, so he is now willing to enlarge it. Because of financially poor conditions, Gnel isn't able to purchase tools and equipment that he needs for providing reconstruction service of refrigerators. This is a reason Gnel has applied for this loan. He has now been approved for a loan, within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The Start-Up loan program provides business start-up loans, with soft conditions, to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan will greatly assist Gnel, and he will be able to increase the quality of service he provides.

loans.use: to purchase tools and equipment needed for providing reconstruction service of refrigerators

loans.name: Phum

texts.en:
Phum is 68 years old and lives in Cheung Prey district, Kampong Cham province. She is married and has four children, who all are married and have independent lives. Phum is in the business of farming rice and earns a net profit of USD 1.50 per day by doing this work. 

Phum’s family doesn’t have a motorcycle to satisfy their transportation needs, so she needs to buy a motorcycle to make their lives more comfortable. As she has insufficient money, she decided to borrow a loan amounting to 1,300 US dollars from HKL. In the future, Phum hopes to save enough to buy a few pieces of land, which would improve her farming productivity.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to satisfy her family's transportation needs.

loans.name: Tahmina

texts.en: Tahmina is a 43-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Currently she is requesting a loan of Rs. 50,000 to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales which will ultimately help in generating more income for her. She is in her sixth loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Sonia Del Socorro

texts.es: Sonia del Socorro Mayor de edad soltera originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega zona donde predomina el comercio. el turismo y bellas playas donde también existe uno de los puertos mas grande del país, ella se dedica a la venta de pozol, tiste, semillas, nacatamales, pepena, fritos, entre otros, ofrece sus alimentos en diferentes barrios, mercados y en su casa de habitación, tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, los cuales da al contado y al crédito recuperando su inversión semanal, se caracteriza por ser una mujer responsable, con muchos deseos de superación personal, desde muy temprano comienza su jornada de trabajo diario para lograr que sus clientes tengan sus productos muy temprano. El objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en la compra de materia prima para realizar sus deliciosos nacatamales, pozoles, tiste, semillas entre otros mas. Sonia esta muy contenta con el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Sonia del Socorro Mayor is a single woman. She lives in one of the municipalities in the Chinandega zone. Here, commerce is one of the main activities, along with tourism. There are beautiful beaches and one of the largest ports in the country.

Sonia sells traditional food and beverages like pozol (a drink made from ground cornmeal and cacao), tiste (a drink made from cornmeal, cacao, and sugar), seeds, nacatamales (Nicaraguan tamales), pepena, fried foods, and other things. She sells her food in various neighborhoods, markets, and from her home. She has regular and occasional customers who pay in cash and on credit, allowing her to re-coup her weekly investments.

She is a responsible woman who wants to improve herself. She begins her workday very early so that her customers will have their products early.

The goal of this loan is to invest in raw materials so that she can make her delicious nacatamales, pozoles, tiste, seeds, and other traditional food and beverages. Sonia is very happy with the support that Kiva lenders provide to people with few economic resources.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials like corn, jicaro seeds, cacao, flour, ropes, chilies, annatto, milk, firewood, etc. to make food to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary lives in the Paynesville area, with her fiancé and five children between 9 and 24 years old. Only four of her children are attending school. She stopped her own education at the third grade.

She has been selling fish in the local market, for the past eight years. She likes how people respond to her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish for her business. She plans to buy land and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Kouser

texts.en: Kouser is a 41-year-old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. To make her store fully stocked, she is requesting a loan of Rs 30,000 which she will use to buy stocks of rice, sugar, and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. Kouser wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital. She is in her third loan cycle with good repayment history.

loans.use: to buy stocks of rice, sugar, and flour

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Jessica Karina

texts.es:
Jessica es una mujer de 24 años, es soltera y tiene un niño de 7 años quien está en la escuela y a quien ha tenido que sacar adelante ella sola. Vive en casa de sus padres en Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, ciudad conocida porque en ella habita la etnia Tsachila, es una zona muy productiva tanto en ganadería como agricultura, muy comercial por ser el puerto de intercambio entre las regiones Costa y Sierra del Ecuador. 
Jessica empezó de poco  a poco con su negocio debido a la necesidad y falta de empleo, primero inició vendiendo vinchas para niñas y también vendía “bolos” de chocolate  que ella mismo los preparaba, luego fue creciendo y adquiriendo experiencia en comercialización de artículos varios. Ahora cuenta con un bazar junto a una escuela, en el mismo local también trabaja su madre quien tiene una pequeña tienda. Ambas se ayudan mutuamente, atiende de lunes a sábado, al menos 10 horas al día y le ha ido muy bien en este último año, ha incrementado también una copiadora y venta de útiles escolares. Acudió a Fundación Alternativa para solicitar un crédito que lo usará en la compra de cuadernos, esferos, lápices, hojas y demás, para incrementar el stock de surtido en el bazar. Jessica espera que con esta inversión sus ganancias mejoren y así poder brindar a su hijo un mejor estilo de vida y darle todo lo que necesite para un día poder verlo convertido en un profesional de excelencia. 
Jessica agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo para hacer sus sueños realidad, pues uno de sus sueños es poder adecuar su casa para poder ubicar allí su bazar y así dejar de arrendar.
texts.en:
Jessica, 24, is single and has a seven-year-old son, who is in school and whom she supports on her own. She lives in her parent's house in Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, a city known for its indigenous Tsachila residents and for being a productive farming and livestock-raising area. There is much commerce here, as it is the port of exchange between Ecuador's coast and mountain regions. 

Jessica built her business over time and out of necessity and lack of employment. She began selling girl's headbands and chocolate balls that she made. As the business grew, she gained experience selling other items. She now has a bazaar in a school where she works with her mother, who also has a small shop. They help each other, and she works from Monday to Saturday for at least 10 hours a day. Business was very good this year, and she has added a copier and school supplies.

She has applied to Fundación Alternativa for a loan to buy notebooks, pens, pencils, paper, and more to stock more inventory for the bazaar. Jessica expects to increase her earnings with this investment and be able to offer her son a better standard of living and all that he needs so that one day he will have a career. Jessica thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support to make her dreams a reality. One of her dreams is to have a house where she can set up her bazaar and stop renting.

loans.use: to buy stationery supplies for her store.

loans.name: Zilola

texts.ru: Зилола доброжелательная и позитивная женщина. Она замужем и имеет несколько детей. Живёт она со своей семьёй в небольшом сельском посёлке. Зилола является настоящей мастерицей по рукоделию. Она занимается вышивкой национальной одежды. Этим самым она зарабатывает на жизнь. За всё время, когда она занимается этим видом деятельности, она успела изучить все тонкости своего дела и воспитать ряд учеников. Зилола с самого начала своей деятельности привыкла выполнять свои заказы на высшем уроне. И поэтому сегодня у неё имеется много постоянных клиентов. Супруг ее находится на заработках в России. Он также помогает ей приносить доход в общий бюджет семьи. Каждый месяц он высылает ей денежные средства. Сейчас Зилола желает отремонтировать свой дом, в котором они живут, так как некоторые части этого дома пришли в неисправное состояние из-за частых дождей. Но денежных средств, которые она накопила, не хватает на все необходимые расходы по ремонту. Поэтому Зилола обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для ремонта своего дома. Она заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Zilola is a friendly and positive woman. She has a husband and a few kids. She lives with her family in a small rural village. Zilola is a real master of needlework. She embroiderers national dresses. This is how she makes her living. She has worked at this activity for a long time. She has had time to study all of the details of this business and teach some students. Zilola and her family, from the beginning, have been used to fulfilling orders at a high rate. And because of this, today she has a lot of regular clients. Her spouse works in Russia. He helps her generate income for the general budget of the family. Every month he sends her money. Now Zilola wants to renovate the home in which they live, as not long ago some parts of the house came into disrepair due to frequent rains. But the money she has saved, is not enough to cover all the necessary costs of the repairs. Zilola asked Arvand because she wants to get a loan to buy building materials for repairs to her house. She thanks Arvand in advance for your support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Najma

texts.en: Najma is a 37-year-old married woman and mother of five. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing tailoring services in her community. She has been doing it for many years. She very well knows the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operating her business, she requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy a stock of threads in different colors, along with the packs of zippers and buttons. It will help her stitch up more dresses on time to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy a stock of threads in different colors, along with packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Asia

texts.en: Asia is a 40-year-old married woman doing business selling milk for the past 10 years. She has 3 dairy cows, which she uses for milk selling to the people of her community. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life. She has five children; all are school-going. She is very motivated to provide them with a beautiful life, good education, food, and clothing. She wants to improve her business, so she contacted Kashf Foundation, and applied for a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase one more cow. It will help her inflate her sales and profits alongside.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Nighat

texts.en: Nighat, age 31, deals in the business of animal sales. She buys animals, such as baby goats and calves at low prices, brings them up and then sells them out in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of Rs. 20,000 to purchase another calf. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase another calf

loans.name: Maria De Fatima Elizabet

texts.es:
Maria es una joven de 22 años de edad, la cual trabaja como secretaria en un pequeño fundo de su ciudad y con el fruto de su trabajo puede sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo de 2 años, al cual quiere mucho.

Maria esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción para poder realizar la mejora del techo de su vivienda y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is a 22-year old young woman.  She works as a secretary at a small estate in her city.  With the fruit of her labor, she is able to get her small son ahead.  Her son is 2-years old and Maria loves him very much. 

Maria is grateful for the Kiva lenders; thanks to the help they have offered, she is able to purchase the construction materials she needs to improve her home's roof and thereby improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Roxana Beatriz

texts.es: Roxana de 26 años de edad reside junto a su grupo familiar el cual está constituido por su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 8 y 11 años de edad.  Roxana se dedica a la agricultura y junto a su compañero de vida cultivan ayotes, tomates, mandarinas,  hojas de banano, etc. Además,  se dedica a la crianza de pollos que luego pone a la venta. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, grava y arena para encementar el piso de la casa el cual es de tierra. Además, desea comprar lámina y tela metálica para reparar el corral de los pollos que actualmente está deteriorada y no es muy seguro.
texts.en: Roxana is 26 years old, and lives with her family, comprising her partner and her two children aged eight and eleven. Roxana makes a living in agriculture, growing squash, tomatoes, mandarins and banana leaves, etc. In addition, she raises chickens to sell. Roxana is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying cement, gravel, and sand to cement the floor of the house, which is earth at the moment. In addition, she wants to buy sheeting and metal wire to repair the chicken run, which is currently in a state of disrepair and isn't very safe.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, sand, metal wire and sheeting to cement the floor and repair the chicken run.

loans.name: Hugo Miguel

texts.es: Hugo Miguel, tiene la edad  de 46 años, está en unión libre, vive con su esposa y sus hijos que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes orgánicos que puedan mejorar las condiciones del suelo, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos  de conservación de suelos  y así evitar la erosión por el agua de lluvia principalmente y trabajos de asistencia para el café para que la cosecha pueda tener un buen desarrollo y una maduración adecuada, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo para hacer resiembras, esto con el objetivo de aumentar la densidad de plantas por área y a la vez  ir renovando la plantación, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que a recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Hugo Miguel, 46, is in a common law marriage, he lives with his wife and their children who are his major priority. 

With his loan he intends to buy organic fertilisers that can improve the soil conditions, to buy fungicides and to pay for manual labour for conserving the soils and in this way to prevent rainwater eroding the soil and work to help the coffee that he will sow to develop well and mature adequately as well as buying a nursery for the seeds, with the objective of increasing the density of plants in the area and at the same time renewing the plantation as well as profiting from the fertility of the soil, the weather  and other conditions that favour coffee cultivation. With these improvements who hopes to obtain a little more income and so to improve his family's life conditions and also to invest a little more in the cultivation area and to fulfill some goals.

This is the first loan that he is receiving from FUDECOSUR. He has not had a loan from state banks previously, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with and a low interest rate.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilisers that can improve the soil conditions, to buy fungicides and to pay for manual labour for conserving the soils for his coffee cultivation

loans.name: Sugran

texts.en:
Sugran is a 46-year-old married woman, running a business selling milk. She has 3 buffaloes and 2 dairy cows, which she uses for milk selling to the people of her locality. She also sells butter and cheese to generate an extra amount of profit. Sugran has become famous for providing good-quality milk, and makes enough to contribute to her family's income. She has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation. 

Currently, she is in her fifth loan cycle, and has applied for a loan of 35,000 PKR. This will allow her to purchase one more cow. Sugran is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her and will bring positive changes to her business.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma, age 41 years, is married and blessed with seven children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that neither has electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food.

Over the years, she has operated a dry fish selling business, selling at the market to town dwellers and passersby. In addition, she sells paraffin to supplement her income. She faces a challenge of high cost of transportation in her business.

With the 20,000 KES, she wants to purchase prawns and dry fish for resale. She joined Yehu because of favorable loaning policies.

loans.use: to purchase prawns and dry fish for resale.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Khalida is a 43-year-old lady and the mother of five children. She has been stitching clothes for the past six years. She knows the techniques of stitching very well. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan of Rs.10,000 to buy stocks of threads in different colors along with packs of zippers and buttons to meet up with the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses. She expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend it on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy stocks of threads in different colors along with packs of zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Zareena is 31 years old and married, doing business selling milk for the past 10 years. She has two cows in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors and earns a good amount of income to contribute to her family’s income. 

She is the mother of four; two daughters and two sons, all in school. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life. 

Now she has requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase another cow and feed for its calves. She hopes to get an increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase another cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Domingo Ramiro

texts.es: Ramiro es un señor que se desempeña como operador de pozo con 32 año de experiencia, actualmente todos sus Hijos tienen su vida propia,no tiene a nadie a su cargo,   es casado su esposa tiene una pequeña pulpería en la casa donde habita, Ramiro se presento a ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento para utilizarlo en  un  tratamiento médico , ya que el se encuentra enferma su esposa ya que ella trabaja por cuenta propia y no tiene  seguros medico , ya que este señor se encuentra preocupado por la salud de su esposa, y este financiamiento lo que utilizara en  gastos de  exámenes, consulta y compra de medicamento y de esa manera mejorar las condiciones familiares.
texts.en: Ramiro is a man who works as a well operator with 32 years of experience. Currently, all over his children have their own life, so he doesn't have anyone to be in charge of. He is married and his wife has a small grocery store in the house where they live. Ramiro appeared at CEPRODEL to request a loan to finance and attain necessary medical treatment. His wife is sick, and because she is self-employed and has no medical insurance, Ramiro is worried about her health. This funding will be used to cover examination fees and to purchase medication, thereby improving the family's conditions.

loans.use: to pay medical costs of examinations, consultation, and purchase medications

loans.name: Marvin Jhonatan

texts.es: Marvin de 23 años de edad  es soltero y habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar.  Él es un joven trabajador ya que desde muy joven se dedica al cultivo de la tierra. Todos los años siembra maíz, frijoles, ayotes, naranjas, etc. De esta forma colabora con la economía del hogar ya que parte de los cultivos los pone a la venta y la otra parte la deja para el consumo. Su casa es muy humilde pero propia y con el fin de dar mayor seguridad habitacional a su familia solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento, grava, hierro y ladrillo para construir un muro perimetral que le permita retener el agua que baja a su casa cuando llueve. Espera poder contar con este apoyo lo antes posible para construir el muro que tanta falta le hace y así dar seguridad a su vivienda y familia.
texts.en:
Marvin is twenty-three years old and is single.  He lives in a house that he owns together with his relatives.  He is a hardworking young man and has been working the land since he was very young.

Every year, he plants corn, beans, pumpkins, oranges, etc.  He is able to contribute to home expenses since he sells some of the products that he grows; he also keeps some of the foods for consumption.  

His house is very basic, but it is his own.  With the hope of making the home more secure and safe for his family, Marvin is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  He hopes to invest in the purchase of sand, cement, gravel, iron bars, and bricks to build a surrounding wall that will also retain water that gathers under the house when it rains.  He hopes to be able to count on this support, making it possible to build a wall and thereby offer improved security to his home and family.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, gravel, iron bars, and bricks to build a wall around his house for increased security.

loans.name: Maria Jacinta

texts.es: Maria Jacinta 37 años de edad casada con cuatro hijos todos aun bajo su responsabilidad y estudiando, originaria del municipio de chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, es una microempresaria que se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general como: venta de ropa niños, adultos, cosméticos, chineria, prendas de oro, plata, bronce, laminado, entre otros también realiza costuras en su casa de habitación a clientes eventuales y fijos, al igual que sale a vender de manera ambulante esta mercadería, ofrece sus productos al contado y al crédito los cuales recupera semanal y quincenal lo invertido, el objetivo de este crédito es para invertir en la compra de mercadería como: cosméticos, chinerias, prendas de oro, tela, elásticos, botones todo esto para realizar algunos trajes que hay cliente le han encargado mas para estas fechas próximas que es la navidad. Maria agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos económicos.
texts.en:
Maria Jacinta, 37, is married and has four dependent, school-age children. She was born in Chinandega in western Honduras. She is a small business owner who sells general merchandise like children's and adult's clothing, cosmetics, decorative items, and gold, silver, and bronze-plated jewelry. She also offers tailoring in her house to new and regular clients. She sells her merchandise as a street vendor and offers her customers cash and weekly or biweekly credit terms.

She will use this loan to buy business inventory such as cosmetics, decorative items, gold jewelry, as well as fabric, thread, elastic, and buttons to make some suits for the upcoming Christmas season. Maria thanks the Kiva lenders for helping low-income people.

loans.use: to buy business inventory such as cosmetics, fabric, thread, gold jewelry, and decorative items.

loans.name: Malohat

texts.ru: Трудное условие жизни заставляет человека направлять все свои усилия и мотивировать существующие ресурсы. Малохат является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она разведена и сама вырастила свою дочь, которой 25 лет. Ее дочь имеет 1 ребенка. Малохат в течение многих лет работала в детском садике. Сегодня она нуждается больше дохода, так как ее единственная дочь осталась вдовой с маленьким ребенком и после смерти мужа она вернулась в дом Малохата. Малохат 3 месяца назад начала свой новый бизнес купле продажей женской и детской одежды. Для того чтобы развевать свой бизнес, она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки женской и детской одежды для расширения оборотного капитала ее нового бизнеса. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Difficult life conditions force a person to direct all of her efforts and motivate existing resources.  Malohat is one of these people, who tries to improve life conditions and stimulate economic being of her family.  She is divorced and raised her daughter, who is now 25 years old, by herself.  Her daughter has one child.  Malohat had worked at a kindergarten for many years.  Today, she needs more income because her only daughter became a widow and returned to Malohat's home after her husband's death.  Malohat started her own business in reselling women's and children's clothing three months ago.  In order to develop her business, she completed the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women, and obtained a certificate.  She is requesting a loan in the amount of 10000 somoni to purchase women's and children's clothing to increase her new business working capital.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase women's and children's clothing to increase her new business working capital

loans.name: Utee B.

texts.en:
Utee is 45 years old and lives in Paynesville. She is single. For the past three years, she has been selling cold soft drinks and juices; she learned this from her mother. She said that her main challenge is the loss of customers. 

Her favorite part of being in this business is the praises from her customers of how her drinks are always cold. She has requested this loan to purchase more soft drinks and juice to resell. She says that in the future, she wishes to buy pieces of land and build a shop.

loans.use: to purchase more soft drinks and juice to resell.

loans.name: Gregorio Manuel

texts.es:
Gregorio es un hombre de 35 años, vive en la ciudad de Chincha con su esposa y sus 3 hijos, el es muy trabajador, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Gregorio no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Gregorio trabaja como obrero de campo en un fundo agrícola de su ciudad,el trabaja todos los días por un aproximado de 10 horas y cree que le va bien por su dedicación y esfuerzo.
Gregorio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada realizará el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea pintar, tarrajear y poner piso a la habitación de sus hijos, así pues Gregorio seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Gregorio is a 35-year old man.  His lives in Chincha with his wife and their three children.  Gregorio is very hard-working and enthusiastic.  He dedicates all of his energy toward getting his family ahead.  Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to start working, Gregorio wasn't able to study at the university level. 
Gregorio started working, on his own initiative, as a laborer on a local farm.  He works every day for approximately ten hours.  He believes work is going well for him because of his dedication and hard work. 
Gregorio is very grateful for the Kiva lenders; thanks to the help they are offering, he will be able to make some improvements to his dwelling.  Gregorio wants to paint, plaster and put a floor down in his children's room.  Gregorio will continue to work and put forth the effort needed to make his greatest dream come true- to see his children become solid professionals.

loans.use: to improve his housing.

loans.name: Zubaida

texts.en:
Zubaida is a vigorous married woman.  She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to the lack of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she has requested a loan of PKR 35,000 from the Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors, along with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate a healthier source of income. 

She is in her ninth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors, along with packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Hawa

texts.en: Hawa is 23 years old, and lives and works in Paynesville. She has two children, ages 7 and 9, who are attending school and living at home. Over the past 5 years, she has been selling cosmetic in the market. She is respected in her family and a mother of a supportive home. A problem she is facing is that she does not have enough money to buy in bigger bulks. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cosmetics for her business. Her plans are to expand her business and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics for her business.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Shabana has successfully built her business manufacturing Waan (a thread-like material used to make a bedstead from a wooden frame on four legs) with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. By this time, she has attained a regular list of customers, and makes enough to contribute to her family’s income.  

To meet with the demands of her customers, she needs to purchase another good quality machine. So she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. It will help increase her production and profits alongside. She is in her 3rd loan cycle, and has shown good repayment behavior. She dreams to expand her business to provide better standards of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase another good quality machine.

loans.name: Oretha

texts.en:
Oretha is 48 years old, and she lives in West Point. She did not go to school, and she has four children between 15 and 30 years old, only one attending school. 

She has been operating a table where she sells red oil. One of her main challenges is she can’t meet the demands of her customers. She is requesting a loan to purchase more red oil for her business. 

In the future she hopes one day to own a shop and build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase more red oil for her business.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 42 years old, and she lives in the West Point area.  She did not go to school.  She is single and has three children, ages 10 to 22 years, all of whom live at home and attend school. 

For the past 23 years, she has been involved in cooking and selling rice and soup. Her main challenge is the large amount of competition in her community but her business is going well. 

She has requested this loan to purchase more rice, pepper, fish, vita, meat, soft drinks, etc. 

In the future, she would like to buy some land and build a good restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, fish, vita, meat, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Farzana

texts.en:
Farzana has successfully built her business manufacturing "waan," a thread-like material used to make a bedstead from a wooden frame on four legs, with the support of the Kashf Foundation and Kiva. By this time she has attained regular list of customers and makes enough to contribute to her family’s income.  

To meet the demands of her customers, she needs to purchase another good-quality machine, so she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000. It will help her to increase her production and profits alongside. 

She is in her third loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to purchase another good-quality machine for her business

loans.name: Tirza Yaneth

texts.es: Tirza de 25 años de edad  habita en condiciones muy humildes junto con su madre en casa de su propiedad.  Ella es muy trabajadora y dedicada en sus quehaceres. Desde hace mucho tiempo, Tirza trabaja como empleada doméstica y de esa forma lleva el sustento a su hogar. Su principal patrimonio es su humilde vivienda la cual con mucho esfuerzo mantiene junto a su madre. Desea mejorar las condiciones de su casa por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra para encementar el piso el cual en la actualidad es de tierra. Espera poder contar con dicho apoyo y hacer las mejoras lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Tirza is 25 years old. She lives in very modest conditions with her mother in a house that she owns. She is very hardworking and dedicated in her daily tasks. 

For a long time, Tirza has worked as a domestic employee; that is how she provides for her household. Her main asset is her humble house, which she and her mother put a lot of effort into maintaining. 

She would like to improve the condition of the house, so she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement and sand and to pay for labor to install a cement floor over the dirt floor they currently have. She hopes to receive this support and to make the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase cement and sand and to pay for manual labor to install a cement floor in her house.

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 32 years old, lives in Paynesville, and she has five children between 1 and 12 years old. Only four of them are attending school, and they all live at home. Her husband is a businessman. For the past six years, Annie has been selling crushed rock. She enjoys how she is respected in her family and a mother of a supportive home. One of the problems she faces is that she does not have a good location for her business.

She is requesting a loan, which she will use to purchase more crushed rock to resell. Her plans are to expand her business and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase more crushed rock to resell.

loans.name: Mukhtar

texts.en:
Ms Mukhtar is  47 years old and married.  She has been doing a business of selling milk for the past 13 years. She has four calves and one cow in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter  that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life.

She has two daughters and two sons, who are in school. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food, and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet day to day expenses of life. 

It’s her second year with the Kashf Foundation; she is happily running her business through its support. Now she has requested a loan of PKR 30,000 to purchase one more cow and feed for its calves. 

She hopes to have increase in the production capacity of milk, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: To purchase another cow and feed for its calves.

loans.name: Concepcion Cayetana

texts.es:
Concepción es un mujer de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de Parcona con su hijo, ella es muy trabajadora, entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Concepción no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional.
Por iniciativa propia, Concepción trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, ella vende desayunos y almuerzos a diversos clientes, Concepción trabaja todos los días y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas,ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buena sazón y dedicación.
Concepción se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que con la ayuda brindada mejorará el techado del puesto que utiliza para sus ventas, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su propio puesto de ventas.
texts.en:
Concepción is a 43-year-old woman. She lives in the city of Ica, in the district of Parcona, with her son. She is very hardworking and enthusiastic, and she puts all her effort into providing for her family. Unfortunately, because she lacked economic resources and had to work, Concepción was not able to earn a degree. 

Concepción works for herself in her small business, selling food. She sells breakfasts and lunches to various customers. Concepción works every day; she is able to work approximately 10 hours per day. She feels happy doing her work and believes that it is going well for her because of her good flavors and hard work.

Concepción is very grateful to the Kiva lenders; with the help they provide, she will improve the roof of the stand that she uses for her sales. This will allow her to keep working and striving to achieve her greatest dream of having her own food stand.

loans.use: to make improvements to her food stand.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en:
Mumtaz, a 42-year-old mother of three daughters and five sons, has been engaged in hand embroidery for the past five years. Her embroidery patterns are very popular in her territory, and the work provides her family with the basic necessities of life including food, clothes and education. 

In order to meet the growing demand for embroidery, Mumtaz has requested a loan of Rs. 30,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy more frames, needles and threads of various colors.
